page.title: 08Transport
page.content:
The main method of transport available is the private motor car. Most people in Upper Heyford village have access to a car.Several families have two or more cars.The USAF families living on the base also have private cars.
There are two daily buses which serve the area. One of these runs to Banbury and one to Bicester.They are not very frequent and are used mainly for the occasional shopping trip.
Trains to Oxford Banbury and London can be caught at Lower Heyford station about one mile away.
